name: GoLinks
headline: Intuitive, easy-to-remember short links - powered by AI.
description:
GoLinks allows you to create internal links for your company that are so easy to remember and share, you don't have to bookmark or copy and paste them in emails. For example, teams use GoLinks to keep track of their dashboard at go/metrics or an employee directory at go/directory - powered by AI. These internal link systems have been a standard for productivity boost within companies like Google, Yahoo, Linkedin, Twitter, and Airbnb for years. GoLinks is the first company building this as a service for everyone else. 75% of all employees at all of our customers use GoLinks every single month.

In 2023, GoLinks, launched two new productivity solutions to build off of their vision of building a Gen AI productivity suite:

- GoSearch (www.gosearch.ai):  An enterprise workplace search solution powered by AI.

- GoProfiles (www.goprofiles.io): A hub for your team to find shared connections, celebrate wins, and boost company culture ‚Äî powered by gen AI!

#####  GO LINK STRUCTURE 
## Go link types for every use case
Re-imagine what you know about internal short links. GoLinks offers a variety of go link types, each designed for specific use cases.
![Variable go links](https://www.golinks.io/d/images/external/landing/golinks_landing_variable_golinks.webp)
#### Variable go links
Insert custom values into a predefined URL to target specific destinations.
![Private go links](https://www.golinks.io/d/images/external/landing/golinks_landing_private_go_links.webp)
#### Private go links
Go links only you can access - keywords do not compete with workspace go links.
![Unlisted go links](https://www.golinks.io/d/images/external/landing/golinks_landing_unlisted_golinks.webp)
#### Unlisted go links
Only accessible to those you share with, unlisted go links are not surfaced in search results.
![Multi-links](https://www.golinks.io/d/images/external/landing/golinks_landing_multi_links.webp)
#### Multi-links
Launch multiple go links with one multi-link.
![Geo-links](https://www.golinks.io/d/images/external/landing/golinks_landing_geo_links.webp)
#### Geo-links
Redirects to destinations based on the location of the user.
![Aliases](https://www.golinks.io/d/images/external/landing/golinks_landing_aliases.webp)
#### Aliases
Adapts its destination based on input variable

#####  GO LINK STRUCTURE 
## Go link types for every use case
Re-imagine what you know about internal short links. GoLinks offers a variety of go link types, each designed for specific use cases.
![Variable go links‚ü®157‚ü©]
#### Variable go links
Insert custom values into a predefined URL to target specific destinations.
![Private go links‚ü®158‚ü©]
#### Private go links
Go links only you can access - keywords do not compete with workspace go links.
![Unlisted go links‚ü®159‚ü©]
#### Unlisted go links
Only accessible to those you share with, unlisted go links are not surfaced in search results.
![Multi-links‚ü®160‚ü©]
#### Multi-links
Launch multiple go links with one multi-link.
![Geo-links‚ü®161‚ü©]
#### Geo-links
Redirects to destinations based on the location of the user.
![Aliases‚ü®162‚ü©]
#### Aliases
Adapts its destination based on input variable

The crux of GoLinks' offering is its user-friendly platform, which has been adopted by influential companies such as Google, Facebook, and Airbnb. Impressive stats reveal that 75% of employees at GoLinks' client organizations utilize its services monthly, effectively enhancing productivity across the board.

In 2023, GoLinks expanded its suite with two AI-powered solutions:
1. **GoSearch**: A workplace search tool that leverages AI to enhance information retrieval.
2. **GoProfiles**: A hub designed to foster team connections and celebrate achievements, thereby enriching company culture.

The company's focus on AI is evident not only in its recent product launches but also in its GoAI functionality, which enhances the search capabilities within the GoLinks ecosystem.

GoLinks currently employs around 70 people and is helmed by Aaron Epstein as a Group Partner. They focus on making the workplace more efficient and engaging, blending technology with a human-centric approach.
